name: minty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
tasting or smelling of mint (= a herb with a strong, fresh flavour): I loved the fresh minty taste.
of a pale green colour: The sweater comes in minty green, pale pink, creamy yellow, and powder blue.
very fresh or new: The books are second-hand but all in minty fresh condition.
More examplesFewer examplesUse mouthwash regularly for fresh minty breath.On the side she served a minty chickpea salad.The leaves have a slight minty flavour.Their shops are immediately recognisable, with their minty colours and playful graphics.We did the upstairs room in a minty grey-green.
